channel.title: Reconnaissance on D0CUM3NTN4T10N
channel.description: Recent content in Reconnaissance on D0CUM3NTN4T10N

item.title: Portscan
item.description: Automated Bash Script link #!/bin/bash if [ "$#" -ne 1 ]; then echo "Usage: ports HOST" exit 2 fi nmap -p- --min-rate 1000 $1 -oN all_ports -vvv -Pn ports=$(grep -iv not all_ports | grep -i 'open\|filtered' | awk -F'/' '{ print $1 }' ORS=',') rustscan --ulimit 5000 -a $1 -p $ports -- -Pn -A --script vuln -oN nmap rm ./all_ports
